text: Charlton Athletic Football Club, is an English football club. The club plays in the Football League One. == League position == Season League Position 2000/01 Premier League 9th 2001/02 Premier League 14th 2002/03 Premier League 12th 2003/04 Premier League 7th 2004/05 Premier League 11th 2005/06 Premier League 13th 2006/07 Premier League 19th 2007/08 League Championship 11th 2008/09 League Championship 24th === Former position === Category:English football clubs Category:1905 establishments in England
title: Charlton Athletic F.C.
